Description
Known for being a great place to work and build a career, KPMG provides audit, tax and advisory services for organizations in today's most important industries. Our growth is driven by delivering real results for our clients. It's also enabled by our culture, which encourages individual development, embraces an inclusive environment, rewards innovative excellence and supports our communities. With qualities like those, it's no wonder we're consistently ranked among the best companies to work for by Fortune Magazine, Consulting Magazine, Working Mother Magazine, Diversity Inc. and others. If you're as passionate about your future as we are, join our team.
KPMG is currently seeking a Sr. Associate, Cyber Security – Cloud DevOps Engineer– to join our Cyber Security Consulting practice
Responsibilities
Coordinate the design and implementation of Secure DevOps engineering solutions
Automate, build, deploy and integrate security tools with application pipelines
Design & configure automation of cloud infrastructure (compute, network, storage, security)
Build process for operations of the automated pipelines and applications
Assist in deploying, configuring, and maintaining security baselines within the Cloud Infrastructure and Application environments
Effectively apply relevant knowledge and experience to provide both technical and operational support to new and existing implementation efforts
Deliver support to both new design and implementation efforts as well as existing, deployed applications, automations, cloud infrastructures and services
Qualifications
A minimum of 3 years of experience in application development, security, infrastructure, cloud and related technology platforms
Bachelor’s Degree
Ability to provide expert strategic advice for cloud application development, cloud application deployment, private versus public cloud options and virtualization
Strong understanding of DevOps practices ools including CICD, Pipelines, IaC\ARM templates
Working knowledge with Source Code Management systems like GitHub, Azure DevOps andCI/CD platforms like Jenkins and GitHub Actions
Familiarity and experience with Kubernetes and container services in AWS/Azure or GCP; experience with managing Infrastructure as Code (IaC) platforms like Terraform, Ansible and Packer are a plus
Experience with security tools for SAST/DAST/RASP like SonarQube, Snyk etc
Travel may be up to 80-100%, work in a fast paced, results driven environment, grasp new technology, and contribute at a rapid pace
